titleStmt.title: Some notes concerning the life of Edward Lord North, Baron of Kirtling, 1658 by Sir Dudley North Lord North.
titleStmt.author: North, Dudley North, Baron, 1602-1677.

notesStmt.note: This item is found at reel 544:ll (bound with Wing N1284B) and at reel 818:15 as Wing N1282 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd. ed.), and at reel 1730:27 as Wing N1286A.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
With: Light on the way to paradise ... / by Dudley the 2d. late Ld. North. London, 1682.
